§ 9801. Statement of purpose The purpose of this subchapter is to encourage the development of special programs by which the residents of urban and rural low-income areas may, through self-help and mobilization of the community at large, with appropriate Federal assistance, improve the quality of their economic and social participation in community life in such a way as to contribute to the elimination of poverty and the establishment of permanent economic and social benefits. (Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 612, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 489.)
